author: Marisa Fernandez
title: New York needs 30,000 ventilators for coronavirus crisis but FEMA is only sending 400
description: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo called on the federal government on Tuesday to supply ventilators, saying the state is in dire need of tens of thousands of machines to manage the coronavirus outbreak. The state expects to only receive 400 ventilators from the Fede…
